name: MG Hector
description: The price of MG Hector, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 13.99  - 22.15 Lakh. It is available in 22 variants, with engine options ranging from 1451 to 1956 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Hector comes with 6 airbags. MG Hector is available in 8 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 14.5 kmpl for Hector.
